  index: "greek_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        greek_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_greek_",
        },
        greek_lowercase: {
          type: "lowercase",
          language: "greek",
        },
        greek_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["παράδειγμα"],
        },
        greek_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "greek",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_greek: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "greek_lowercase",
            "greek_stop",
            "greek_keywords",
            "greek_stemmer",
          ],
        },
      },

  },
